author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0152 classpath of actions contains all JARs twice
The JavaActionExecutor logic was adding JAR files twice to the DistributedCache
thus making the JARs to show up twice in the classpath of jobs

author: kamrul
msg: Formatted a bit startup echo messages.

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0168 Being able to read Oozie configuration for an arbitrary directory

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0168 Being able to read Oozie configuration for an arbitrary directory
If the ENV var OOZIE_CONFIG_DIR is not defined, configuration is read from ${OOZIE_HOME}/conf
